statements: UPDATE CandidateProfiles SET phone_number = '+1-555-123-4567', address = '123 Main St' WHERE candidate_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE candidate_resumes SET resume_text='Experienced professional with 5+ years in software development.', skills='{Java, Python, SQL}', experience='{Software Engineer at ABC Company, Project Manager at XYZ Inc.}', education='{Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Master's Degree in Business Administration}' WHERE candidate_id=202
